About Secret Sauce Partners

Secret Sauce Partners is a market leader in providing data driven merchandising solutions to apparel and footwear retailers globally. Improving their customers shopping experience and retailers revenue at the same time.

Headquarters based in San Francisco.
Developers based in Budapest, Hungary.


About Fit Predictor

Fit Predictor finds a customer's best fit in seconds using existing data, without the need for physical measurements. Already available in ten global markets including the United States.
Supports more than 7,000 brands and 40 million unique users per month.


Job Description

  • Front End Developer
  • Customize the feel and look of third party Javascript applications
  • Helped to build a solution for scaling our main product
  • Improve the experience for users with the best technologies
  • Create responsive web design and cross-browser compatibility on desktop/mobile devices/tablets
  • Fix bugs reported by QA after browser testing on desktop/mobile/tablet

Technologies

  • HTML, CSS3
  • Less, SASS
  • Javascript
  • Grunt, NodeJs
  • Browser extensions
  • Amazon Cloud Services

Budapest, Hungary


July 2017 - August 2018 (1year 2months)
